question.text:
To: Sam Heinz
From: Northways Professional Development
Sent: April 20
Subject: Workshop 4/28-4/30

Dear Workshop Participants,
We look forward to seeing you at the digital storytelling workshop . On the first day, when you enter the Albin College campus, attendants will ----1--- you to lot 43 and the Toteman Building . We will begin each day in conference room 9. Coffee, tea , snacks , and fruit ----2--- in the mornings. Lunch will be sandwiches and salads from Black Horse Restaurant. ---3---- .
In the afternoons, we will be working in the computer lab. We suggest that you assemble some images that you would like to use for your project. It will be ----4--- for you to have them saved on a digital storage device beforehand. If you have any questions, please e-mail us.
Very Best,
Gina Kapuski

answer.explanation: Based on meaning to choose the correct answer
Choosing (A) because the subject includes nouns indicating things (coffee, tea, etc.) is a sign of the passive voice and sentences before and after the space all use the future tense.

choices: (A) Some prior experience working with digital files is assumed.
(B) Please do not bring any copyrighted material to the workshop.
(C) Please let us know if you have any dietary restrictions.
(D) There is a one-time parking charge of fifteen dollars.

answer.text: (C) Please let us know if you have any dietary restrictions.
answer.explanation: Select (C) because the previous 2 sentences all mention food or drink
Based on meaning to choose the correct answer

question.text:
Mifflin Moving Services

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs): When is the best time to move?

There are several factors to consider as you decide when to schedule your move. It may be helpful to know that being flexible with your scheduling can often save you money. (1) -------, moving costs are higher during the summer months when the volume of shipments being handled by your moving company tends to increase. Conversely, moving costs are relatively low during the winter months. (2) -------.

Moreover, regardless of the time of year that you move, being flexible about your loading and delivery dates can also be (3) -------. For example, by giving your moving company a seven-day window to load your shipment, you (4) ------- the chance that your goods will sit in a truck for a long period of time.
(1) -------, moving costs are higher during the summer months when the volume of shipments being handled by your moving company tends to increase.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of conjunctions

question.text: Conversely, moving costs are relatively low during the winter months. (2) -------.
choices: (A) This is true for both residential and commercial moves.
(B) Therefore, allow one to two weeks for your shipment to arrive.
(C) Most moving companies are based in large cities.
(D) Moving is stressful at any time of the year.

answer.text: (A) This is true for both residential and commercial moves.
answer.explanation: The previous sentence is about moving costs => A is the most suitable.

question.text: Moreover, regardless of the time of year that you move, being flexible about your loading and delivery dates can also be (3) -------.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words

question.text: For example, by giving your moving company a seven-day window to load your shipment, you (4) ------- the chance that your goods will sit in a truck for a long period of time.

answer.explanation: With the subject "you" => choose reduce

question.text:
Venley Foods Responsive to Changing Consumers
Who cares where the tomatoes in your salad actually came from? ---1----, an increasing number of people do, according to a study conducted by the Consumer Group. In fact, the study shows that many consumers would pay an average of 10 percent more when given the exact source of a fresh food product. ---2---- . Some grocery stores, such as Venley Foods in Boston, have taken advantage of the trend and used it to implement ---3---- branding and marketing. "If we can tell a story about our product," says Venley Foods CEO Minji Kim, "then we've added ---4---- in the minds of consumers."

answer.explanation: Based on meaning to choose the correct answer

choices: (A) Fresh food can be refrigerated for up to two days.
(B) Many grocery stores have been extending their hours.
(C) Most studies are published in consumer magazines.
(D) The number increases to 20 percent in large cities.

answer.text: (D) The number increases to 20 percent in large cities.
answer.explanation: Select (D) because the previous sentence contains the word “percent”
Choose (C) due before the noun “branding” and “marketing” needs to enter an adjective.
Based on meaning to choose the correct answer

question.text:
Garden Shade Tree Landscaping
Garden Shade creates tree landscapes and hedges to suit every garden, no matter the size. Our designs have ---1---small urban gardens as well as large-scale projects commissioned by architects and property developers. ---2---- . However, no single nursery can offer trees of all species and sizes. That is why Garden Shade has developed close relationships with many specialist growers –- 3--- to provide us with the trees we need . Such resources give us the variety necessary to complete any ---4---- . In other words, whatever your landscape design dream, we can make it happen.

answer.explanation: Based on meaning to choose the correct answer

choices: (A) We are here to answer your landscaping questions.
(B) For most projects, we use trees from our own nurseries.
(C) Some trees have specific growing requirements.
(D) Under normal conditions, nursery stock is guaranteed for one year.

answer.text: (B) For most projects, we use trees from our own nurseries.
answer.explanation: Select (B) because the previous sentence has “project”.
Choose (D) since it is a propositional reduction form relationship. The full sentence is “ ... many specialists growers (who are) ready to provide us ... ”
Based on meaning to choose the correct answer

question.text:
The Durham Fitness and Heath Expo (DFHE) is an international event that brings the fitness and health industries together for three days in one place, (1) ------- the perfect opportunity for these industries to showcase their products and services. The award-winning DFHE is now heading into its fifth year, and plans are in place to make it the largest and most diverse exposition (2) -------, with record numbers of the consumers and industry professionals expected to attend.
(3) -------. Both large and small booths in the vendor exhibition area are still available. Call 1 (800) 555-0156 for more information or to reverse your (4) -------.

The Durham Fitness and Heath Expo (DFHE) is an international event that brings the fitness and health industries together for three days in one place, (1) ------- the perfect opportunity for these industries to showcase their products and services.

answer.explanation: reduced relative clause. The full sentence is: "The Durham Fitness and Heath Expo (DFHE) is an international event that brings the fitness and health industries together for three days in one place, which provides the perfect opportunity .........

question.text: The award-winning DFHE is now heading into its fifth year, and plans are in place to make it the largest and most diverse exposition (2) -------,

answer.explanation: yet: the best, worst, etc. until now

question.text: (3) -------. Both large and small booths in the vendor exhibition area are still available.
choices: (A) The event will take place from August 6 to 8 at the Durham Convention Center.
(B) Changes to the schedule will be announced in the coming weeks.
(C) Most reviews of the event have been positive.
(D) It is not necessary to provide a credit card number at this time.

answer.text: (A) The event will take place from August 6 to 8 at the Durham Convention Center.
answer.explanation: Based on the following sentence which introduces "both large and small booths in the vendor exhibition area are still available" => this sentence is about the event's schedule

question.text: Call 1 (800) 555-0156 for more information or to reverse your (4) -------.

answer.explanation: reverse your space in the event => choose B

question.text:
Nylobe, Inc., Announces Newest Development Project
SEATTLE (May 1)- Researchers at technology firm Nylobe, Inc., are working to develop a sensor capable of detecting corrosion caused by environmental exposure. Corrosion is a major contributor to ---1---- losses in the aircraft industry each year. "This will be a major ----2--- for commercial airline fleets," says Mel Laveau, Nylobe's CEO. "The sensor will decrease both labor and maintenance costs without being too expensive."
According to Ms. Laveau, the sensor will work by detecting corrosion in its early stages, when the problem can be corrected simply by removing the corroded material. ----3---. In the structure of large aircraft, some critical joints can be particularly susceptible to corrosion. ----4--- , the sensor can be used to inspect these areas and then target the most likely areas of concern.

answer.explanation: Choose (C) due in front of the plural noun(losses) requires an adjective
Based on meaning to choose the correct answer

choices: (A) This will reduce the need for making expensive structural repairs.
(B) The parts have all been replaced with higher quality materials.
(C) The next stage of the project involves scanning the affected areas.
(D) Its style and sleek design made it popular with the public.

answer.text: (A) This will reduce the need for making expensive structural repairs.
answer.explanation: Select (A) because the following sentence has the  word “structure”
Based on meaning to choose the correct answer

question.text:
To: Staff
From: Amy Henwith
Date: 15 January
Subject: Exciting news

Dear Staff,
Thanks for a great year! In case you haven't heard, Henwith Home Supply will be ----1---our second store this spring. This additional retail site will be located in the shopping centre at the corner of Aberton Parkway and Sutton Avenue in Derbyshire.
We will be accepting applications for cashiers and sales positions ---2--- 1 April. The personnel director will review applicants' qualifications from 2 April to 6 April, and ----3--- is scheduled to begin one week later. –-4---.
Best,
Amy Henwith, CEO
Henwith Home Supply

answer.explanation: Based on meaning to choose the correct answer
Based on meaning to choose the correct answer
Choose (B) means training, coaching by the leading blank as the subject need a suitable noun

choices: (A) Feel free to share this news with any interested friends.
(B) Make sure you have received all of the material.
(C) Contact Henwith Home Supply if you are still waiting for a response.
(D) Access to the main entrance will be blocked by construction.

answer.text: (A) Feel free to share this news with any interested friends.
answer.explanation: Select (A) since the previous 2 sentences are a rule guide. This is implied by the recruiter a kind of news

question.text:
Milo Ferris
1690 Ascot Road
Kenilworth
Cape town 7708
19 October

Dear Mr. Ferris,
This letter is to advise you that the water main in your area will be (1) ------- between the hours of 1:00 A.M and 6:00 A:M on 29 and 30 October.
The system is (2) ------- some urgent work to accommodate the increasing demand for water use in Kenilworld. (3) -------. The entire project will be completed within the next three months.
We apologize for the inconvenience that the interruption in your water supply will cause. These upgrades, however, are (4) -------. We will make every effort to complete the work as efficiently as posible.

Sincerely,
Kagiso Pillay
Operations Manager, Cape Town Water Supply and Maintenance
kpillay@ctwsm.za/(021-555-0012)
This letter is to advise you that the water main in your area will be (1) ------- between the hours of 1:00 A.M and 6:00 A:M on 29 and 30 October.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of phrasal verbs

question.text: The system is (2) ------- some urgent work to accommodate the increasing demand for water use in Kenilworld.

answer.explanation: The blank precedes a noun => choose preposition

question.text: (3) -------. The entire project will be completed within the next three months.
choices: (A) The total cost is still not known.
(B) The hours of operation are subject to change.
(C) Sales are expected to increase steadily.
(D) The work will be done in several stages.

answer.text: (D) The work will be done in several stages.
answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of sentences => D is correct

question.text: These upgrades, however, are (4) -------.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words

question.text:
Amon Donates to Music School in Grenel City
A spokesperson for Brenda Amon ---1---- that the pianist made a sizeable donation toward the expansion of the Grenel City Conservatory of Music. "Without her generous support," said Marc Diaz, director of facility planning, "we would have been limited in our renovation plans going forward."
---2---- . Now, a new wing will be constructed on the south end of the ---3---- conservatory. Once completed, the building will boast a 700-seat auditorium, state-of-the-art recording studios, and new faculty and administrative offices. Additionally, private practice rooms will be located ---4--- the current student lounge.

answer.explanation: Choose (C) because the subject a spokesperson is singular nouns and main verbs in propositions after that is dividing the past simple (made)

choices: (A) Ms. Amon's performance at the conservatory was outstanding.
(B) The project had been delayed because of budget cuts.
(C) Student enrollment has decreased over the past few years.
(D) The original conservatory is being converted into student housing.

answer.text: (B) The project had been delayed because of budget cuts.
answer.explanation: Select (B) since the previous sentence contains a phrase “renovation plans” => this is a project
Based on meaning to choose the correct answer
Based on meaning to choose the correct answer

question.text:
Date: 11 January
To: Mitchell Parker [mparker@allmail.co.za]
From : Inez Lofaro [ilofaro@daqtex.co.za]
Subject: Product recall

Dear Mr. Parker,
Thank you for your recent ---1--- of the Daqtex Mini-V camera. We are contacting everyone who has recently bought this product to inform them that certain models are being recalled for repair. In these models, the electronic chip that enables the digital conversion of light is faulty. ---2---- . Please ----3---whether your camera has this problem by checking the serial number on the bottom of the camera. If it ends with the letters TVX, a repair will be required. Daqtex will pay all shipping costs for sending your Mini-V back to us. In addition, we will repair ---4---- free of charge.
Thank you,
Inez Lofaro, Customer Service Manager
Daqtex Industries

answer.explanation: Based on meaning to choose the correct answer

choices: (A) We hope you will enjoy the product for many years to come.
(B) It is covered in the troubleshooting section of the manual.
(C) This defect will eventually interfere with the clarity of your images.
(D) This special feature is unavailable on some older models.

answer.text: (C) This defect will eventually interfere with the clarity of your images.
answer.explanation: Choose (C) because the previous sentence contains the word “faulty” and mentioned an error with this model.
Select (C) because after “please” need to fill infinitive verbs.
Choose (B) because the space after the verb repair needs to enter an object instead of name the singular word (your Mini-V) in the previous sentence
